# Display   GUESTS - GENDER - NIGHTS
	
	if value == "value": # In designer (doesn't pass dataset)
		return "GUESTS - GENDER - NIGHTS"

	else: #While running Session
		guests = value.getValueAt(0, "capacity")
		gender = value.getValueAt(0, "genderAccepted")

			gender = 'None'
		string = str(guests) + " - " + str(gender)# + " - " + str(nights)
		return string

	len = value.getRowCount()
	bedsProjected = value.getValueAt(len-1,'bedsProjected')
	bedsActualLastSeason = value.getValueAt(len-1,'bedsActualLastSeason')
	if bedsProjected == None or bedsActualLastSeason == None:
		growthCount = 0
	else:
		growthCount = bedsProjected - bedsActualLastSeason
	return growthCount

self.custom.nextHost =[]
	self.custom.lastHost = []
	date = []
	daysBefore = []
	daysAfter = []
	data = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(value)
	startDayOfSeason = system.date.getDayOfYear(system.date.getDate(int(self.view.custom.Year1), 10, 1))
	endDayOfCurrentYear = system.date.getDayOfYear(system.date.getDate(int(self.view.custom.Year1), 12, 31))
	for row in data:
		dayOfYear=row[1]
		## calclulate date and day based on day of year
		if dayOfYear >= startDayOfSeason: # and dayOfYear <= endDayOfCurrentYear:
			dates = calendar.dayOfYearToDate(dayOfYear,int(self.view.custom.Year1))
		else:
			dates = calendar.dayOfYearToDate(dayOfYear,int(self.view.custom.Year2))
#		dates = calendar.dayOfYearToDate(dayOfYear=row[1])
		date.append(dates)
		date.sort()
		
	for days in date:
		
		dateNow = system.date.now()
		dateNowFormat = system.date.format(dateNow,"MM/dd/YYYY")
		isBefore = system.date.isBefore(days,dateNow)
		
		
		if isBefore:
			
			isBeforeFormat = system.date.format(days,"MM/dd/YYYY")
			daysBefore.append(isBeforeFormat)
#			daysBefore.sort()
			self.custom.lastHost = daysBefore[-1:]
			
		else:
			
			isAfterFormat = system.date.format(days,"MM/dd/YYYY")
			daysAfter.append(isAfterFormat)
#			daysAfter.sort()

			if daysAfter[0:1] == dateNowFormat:
			
				self.custom.nextHost = daysAfter[0:1]
				
			else:
				self.custom.nextHost = daysAfter[0:1]#system.date.format(days,"YYYY-MM-dd")
	
	if len(self.custom.lastHost) == 0:
		## get the schedule for last year
		namedQ = "WinterShelterGlobal/getCurrentSchedule"
		params = {'locationId':self.view.params.locationID, 'seasonId':self.custom.previousSeasonId}
		
		prevScheduleData = system.db.runNamedQuery(namedQ ,parameters =params)
		
		if prevScheduleData is not None:
			
			date = []
			daysBefore = []
			daysAfter = []
			data = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(prevScheduleData)
			startDayOfSeason = system.date.getDayOfYear(system.date.getDate(int(self.view.custom.Year1) - 1, 10, 1))
			endDayOfCurrentYear = system.date.getDayOfYear(system.date.getDate(int(self.view.custom.Year1) - 1, 12, 31))
			
			system.perspective.print("startDayOfSeason : " + str(startDayOfSeason))
			system.perspective.print("endDayOfCurrentYear : " + str(endDayOfCurrentYear))
			for row in data:
				
				dayOfYear=row[1]
				
				## calclulate date and day based on day of year
				if dayOfYear >= startDayOfSeason: # and dayOfYear <= endDayOfCurrentYear:
					dates = calendar.dayOfYearToDate(dayOfYear,int(self.view.custom.Year1) -1)
				else:
					dates = calendar.dayOfYearToDate(dayOfYear,int(self.view.custom.Year2) - 1)
					
		#		dates = calendar.dayOfYearToDate(dayOfYear=row[1])
				date.append(dates)
				date.sort()
				
			for days in date:		
				isBeforeFormat = system.date.format(days,"MM/dd/YYYY")
				system.perspective.print(isBeforeFormat)
				daysBefore.append(isBeforeFormat)
		#			daysBefore.sort()
				self.custom.lastHost = daysBefore[-1:]
	return daysAfter
